Registry of Open Data on AWS

Geosnap Data, Center for Geospatial Sciences

demographics geospatial urban

Description

This bucket contains multiple datasets (as Quilt packages) created by the Center for Geospatial Sciences (CGS) at the University of California-Riverside. The data in this bucket contains the following:1) Tabular and geographic data from the US Census 2) Land Cover imagery collected from Multi-Resolution Land Characteristics Consortium 3) Road network data processed from OpenStreetMap

Update Frequency

Annually

License

BSD

Documentation

https://spatialucr.github.io/geosnap-guide/home

Managed By

UCR Center for Geospatial Sciences

See all datasets managed by UCR Center for Geospatial Sciences.

Contact

Eli Knaap knaap@ucr.edu

Usage Examples

Tools & Applications
  • Geosnap User Guide by Eli Knaap

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    Data files stored as Apache parquet and GeoTiff in a public bucket
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::spatial-ucr
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://spatial-ucr/ --no-sign-request
